"@Evident Disaster":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54ea9a056368723917a40600#post_54ea9a056368723917a40600
Yeah, multitasking while cooking is hard but you'll get used to it.

"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54ea9a1463687229c9760800#post_54ea9a1463687229c9760800
Step 1: Heat pan.
Step 2: Pour oil.
Step 3: Wait till you hear a pop from oil.
Step 4: Crack egg on pan.
Step 5: Cook for one or two minutes.

Done! Seriously, cooking an egg is the first thing anyone ever learns how to.
